thread.title: Trump Tweets Comment About Fake News Being ‘Enemy of the American People’
thread.title_full: Trump Tweets Comment About Fake News Being ‘Enemy of the American People’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Trump Tweets Comment About Fake News Being ‘Enemy of the American People’
text:
Trump Tweets Comment About Fake News Being ‘Enemy of the American People’ by Josh Feldman | 4:47   
President Trump sent out a tweet this afternoon —which was quickly deleted — that took yet another shot at the “fake news”: Trump just deleted this pic.twitter.com/4wgQzZNADR 
— Colin Jones (@colinjones) February 17, 2017 Trump tweeted and then deleted this… pic.twitter.com/2UnBArAzej 
— Adam Feuerstein (@adamfeuerstein) February 17, 2017 
UPDATE — 4:50 pm ET: Trump tweeted out the sentiment with additional news outlets thrown in: The FAKE NEWS media (failing @nytimes , @NBCNews , @ABC , @CBS , @CNN ) is not my enemy, it is the enemy of the American People! 
Trump’s feud with the press kicked into overdrive after yesterday’s incredibly contentious press conference . 
[ image via Shutterstock ]
